item.description: Flip for Free Pancakes! February 28, 2012 Since beginning its National Pancake Day celebration in 2006, IHOP has raised nearly $8 million to support charities in the communities in which it operates. On February 28, 2012, guests from around the country are invited to celebrate National Pancake Day at IHOP and enjoy a free short stack of Buttermilk pancakes.* In return for the free pancakes, guests are asked to consider leaving a donation for Children's Miracle Network Hospitals© and other designated local charities. http://www.ihoppancak... ***Please plan on leaving a donation similiar to the price of the short stack of pancakes***

group.name: PartyExpress !! Let's Get Together and have Fun!

item.name: National Pancake Day at IHOP -- for charity Hamden, CT
